column4: nobody has ANY idea as to why my pppd connection times out soon after connection?
but the net works during that time - web, irc etc?
methinks you've a wrong option in your ppp settings - there's a file under /etc/ppp/peers/ that has the ppp options for that connection - find it & pastebin
is this a telstra service? if so, that would sound right
its not but thats where the -detach /dev/ttyUSB0 settings are
Id have to reboot to do that
which isp is this service with? & is the modem usb or rs232 ?
